entry.title: Combined summary - Bitcoin and ISO
entry.summary: Jeff Garzik, an exMULTI, Inc. employee, has emphasized the significance of standardization in the world of Bitcoin in a forum post on bitcointalk.org. Although he did not provide further information on which aspects of Bitcoin require standardization, his message suggests that even small efforts towards standardization can be beneficial. Garzik's post is worth monitoring for anyone interested in Bitcoin development and evolution. The importance of standardization could potentially have a significant impact on Bitcoin's growth and adoption as a mainstream currency.
